text: "Bankrobber" is a 1980 song by English punk rock band The Clash. It was never released on any of their studio albums and instead appearing on their compilation album Black Market Clash. It went to number 12 in the United Kingdom and number 14 in both New Zealand and Ireland. ==Track listing== ; 7" vinyl # "Bankrobber" (The Clash) – 4:36 # "Rockers Galore... UK Tour" (Mikey Dread) – 4:42 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:The Clash songs Category:Reggae songs
title: Bankrobber
